errorDevelopmentModeWarning: The Development environment shouldn't be enabled for deployed applications. It can result in displaying sensitive information from exceptions to end users. homeWelcomeText: Discover the original concept of Maison Eau d'Or located at 123 Avenue René Coté in Le Havre
homeOfferingText: We offer unique collections of perfumes and interior sprays
paymentPageDescription: For billing and ordering purposes only
privacyPolicySubtitle: Protecting your privacy is paramount to Maison Eau D'Or.
privacyPolicyContent: We ensure the protection of your privacy during your visits to our website or when placing orders online. Maison Eau D'Or provides products and services and acts as the data controller for the personal data you provide when placing an order. You can contact Maison Eau D'Or's Data Protection Officer using the contact form at the bottom of this page. This privacy policy defines how personal data about you is collected, processed, and shared when you visit the site or order from maisoneaudor.sumup.link (the 'Website').
privacyPolicyTitle: What personal data do we collect?
privacyPolicyContentData: When you make or attempt to make a purchase via the Website, we collect certain data about you, including your name, billing address, shipping address, payment information (including credit card numbers), email address, and phone number. This information is referred to as 'Order Information.' When you visit the Website, we automatically collect certain information about your device, including data about your web browser, IP address, and time zone; certain cookies are installed on your device. Additionally, when you browse the Website, we collect information about the specific pages or products you view, the sites or search terms that redirected you to the Website, and data about how you interact with the Website. This automatically collected data is referred to as 'Device Information.' We collect device information using the following technologies: - 'Cookies' are data files that are placed on your device or computer; they generally contain a unique anonymous identifier. For more information about cookies and how to disable them, visit http://www.allaboutcookies.org. - 'Log files' track activities on the Website and collect data, including your IP address, browser type, internet service provider, referral/exit pages , and timestamps. - 'Beacons,' 'tags,' or 'pixels' are electronic files used to record information about how you navigate the Website.
privacyPolicyTitleDataPerso: How do we process personal data about you?
privacyPolicyContentDataPerso: Order-related information is generally processed to fulfill orders placed on the website (including processing your payment information, managing shipping arrangements, and issuing invoices and/or order confirmations). Additionally, this order-related information is processed to: - communicate with you; - monitor orders to detect potential risks or fraud; and - send you informational or advertising communications about our products and services if such communications align with the preferences you've shared with us. Data about you is processed to fulfill our contractual obligations to you (e.g., in the case of an order on our website) or to otherwise defend our legitimate business interests as listed above. Device information (especially your IP address) is collected to detect potential risks and fraud, and more generally to improve and optimize the website.
privacyPolicytitleShareData: Sharing of personal data about you
privacyPolicyContentShareData: We share personal data about you with third parties to process them in accordance with the conditions defined above. For example, we use SumUp to enhance our online store. We also use Google Analytics to understand how our customers use the site - to learn more about how Google uses personal data about you, visit the following page: https://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/privacy/. You can disable Google Analytics by clicking the following link: https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout. We may share data as part of contracts with service providers who contribute to some of our activities. These contracts stipulate that such providers are entitled to process data about you only for the purposes of the services they perform on our behalf and are prohibited from using it for their own benefit. Similarly, we may disclose personal data about you to comply with a legal or regulatory requirement, a subpoena, a search warrant, and/or any other legitimate information request we receive or to otherwise protect our rights.
privacyPolicyContentTransfertData: We may transfer data collected about you to third parties acting on our behalf located in countries outside the European Economic Area (EEA) or in countries deemed by the European Commission to provide a satisfactory level of data protection. It's possible that these other countries may not offer the same level of protection for data collected about you.
privacyPolicyContentText: We ensure the protection of your privacy during your visits to our website or when placing orders online. Maison Eau D'or provides products and services and acts as the controller for the personal data you provide when placing an order. You can contact Maison Eau D'or's Data Protection Officer using the contact form at the bottom of this page. This privacy policy outlines how personal data about you is collected, processed, and shared when you visit the site or place an order on maisoneaudor.sumup.link (the 'Website').

termsConditionsPageTitle: Maison Eau D'or - Terms and Conditions
termsConditionsPageTitleIntro: Please find below our terms and conditions regarding the use of the website maisoneaudor.sumup.link and the purchase of products on this site.
termsConditionsPageTitleContactInfo: Feel free to contact us with any questions regarding these conditions using the contact form below.
termsConditionsPageTitleSiteUsage: Customer use of the website is governed by these terms and conditions as well as any notices or conditions on any other part of the website...
termsConditionsPageTitleContractEffect: The contract will only take effect between you (as the customer) and us once the order has been processed and shipped.
termsConditionsPageTitleOrderGuarantee: By placing an order, you accept these terms and conditions and acknowledge having read them before proceeding with the order.
termsConditionsPageTitleCancelOrder: As a customer, you can cancel an order within 14 days and will be refunded the amount of the order to the account with which you paid your order.
termsConditionsPageTitleAcceptOrder: When an order is placed, you will receive an order confirmation at the email address provided during payment, containing information about the content and price of the order.
termsConditionsPageTitleDeliveryOptions: As a buyer, you can choose from the mentioned delivery options and the time that suits you best. Maison Eau D'or cannot be held responsible for any damage caused during transport or due to any delay beyond its control...
termsConditionsPageTitleReturnPolicy: Maison Eau D'or accepts returns within 14 days if the items have not been used, modified, washed, or otherwise handled. Items must be returned in their original packaging. Items cannot be returned to Maison Eau D'or without the prior written consent of Maison Eau D'or and are subject to return fees.
termsConditionsPageTitleLiability: We strive to maintain the information on this website as accurate as possible; however, we make no warranties in this regard, whether express or implied...
termsConditionsPageTitleSeverability: Any provision of these terms and conditions that is deemed void, illegal, or unenforceable for any reason will be deemed severed from the rest of the terms and conditions, which will remain valid and enforceable.
aboutText: We are warmly welcomed at the Ydentik boutique located at 123 Avenue René Coté in Le Havre. Their concept is to create unique and personalized perfumes. I find the idea brilliant. The decor is chic and clean in white colors, perfume bottles fill one side of the wall like in bars, and on the other side, we discover the scents of the blends. Most often, we know well that in a perfume, it's the brand and packaging that we pay for, but here, that's no longer the case. The team is welcoming and attentive. It's up to you to compose your perfume with their advice. Once you've chosen your ingredients, they prepare your unique perfume cocktail.
